summary: An undercover cop infiltrates the world of motocross racing.
cast: Fabio Testi|Vittorio Mezzogiorno|Daniela Poggi|Jacques Herlin|Marilda Donà|Franco Odoardi|José Luis de Vilallonga|Lia Tanzi|Marco Bonetti|Guerrino Crivello|Sasha D'Arc|Massimo Ghini|Gianni Gori|Romano Puppo|Cameron Steel|Andrea Aureli|Omero Capanna|Riccardo Petrazzi
title: Speed Cross
